me.aliceq.garbler.analyzer

Class RepeatLetterAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aliceq.garbler.analyzer.RepeatLetterAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GarblerAnalyzer<java.lang.Character>

    public class RepeatLetterAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GarblerAnalyzer<java.lang.Character>
    Analyzer which keeps track of how certain letters are repeated. Non-repeated letters are ignored, only letters with known sequences are stored.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RepeatLetterAnalyzer() 
      RepeatLetterAnalyzer(int max)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void analyze(java.lang.String word)
      Analyzes a passed word
      void clear()
      Clears all data within the analyzer.
      HeatMap<java.lang.Character> next(java.lang.String context, java.lang.String wordPrefix)
      Returns a HeatMap of all the words of at least n-length (where n is the number of repetitions at the endo f wordPrefix) and how often they occur relative to each other.

      • next

        public HeatMap<java.lang.Character> next(java.lang.String context,
                                java.lang.String wordPrefix)
        Returns a HeatMap of all the words of at least n-length (where n is the number of repetitions at the endo f wordPrefix) and how often they occur relative to each other.
        Specified by:
        next in interface GarblerAnalyzer<java.lang.Character>
        Parameters:
        context - the context the current word is in
        wordPrefix - the currently worked-on word
        Returns:
        a normalized HeatMap of String probabilities for the current analyzer

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: GarblerAnalyzer
        Clears all data within the analyzer. This should be equivalent to making a new instance with the same configuration.
        Specified by:
